about_the_game:
Welcome to Top Jump, an exhilarating and addictive game that will test your speed, agility, and strategic thinking! Race against other players in a thrilling vertical challenge, as you strive to reach the summit of a treacherous cave and secure your position on the leaderboard. Can you conquer the heights and claim the top spot?

In Top Jump, your primary objective is to ascend the cave as quickly as possible. Leap from platform to platform, avoiding obstacles and deadly traps, all while maintaining a lightning-fast pace. Precision and timing are crucial as you navigate through the ever-changing environment, filled with pitfalls and hurdles that can hinder your progress.

What sets Top Jump apart is the ability to manipulate time. In the infinite training mode, you have the power to rewind time endlessly, enabling you to perfect your strategies, explore alternative routes, and enhance your skills. However, in the competitive ranked mode, time manipulation is limited and can only be used sparingly during each run. Be strategic in deciding when to activate this feature, as every instance will cost you valuable seconds, potentially affecting your chances of climbing the leaderboard.

Are you ready to embark on the ultimate climbing challenge? Put your jumping skills to the test in Top Jump and prove that you have what it takes to reach the summit and become the reigning champion of the leaderboard!

name: Top Jump: Hardest Parkour Game

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8/10/11 (64-Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600@ 3.1 GHz or AMD R5 1600X @ 3.5 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8/10/11 (64-Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 10400 3.1 GHz or AMD Ryzen 5 2600x 3.1 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Climb fast, reach the top! In Top Jump, race through a perilous cave to dominate the leaderboard. Time can be rewound in training, but in ranked mode, use it wisely to avoid losing precious seconds. Precision, speed, and strategy are key in this addictive vertical challenge!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
